title: Need Feedback xD

embed.description: Hope u enjoy this one. Feedback would be great :) _________________________________________________________________ SomeMechanics is a series which is based on short League of Legends clips. Every episode there will be another champion which we will focus. _________________________________________________________________ Track: Spektrem - Shine [NCS Release] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4tK7LYFxI0) _________________________________________________________________ Game: League of Legends (http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en)

body:
Hey i have opened a new Youtube channel :) the thing is im really unexperienced in editing videos so it is very short. :D
It would help me a lot if u just click on the link, watch my first video on youtube and give me some feedback below.

i really wanna improve :)

Have a great day, 
SeeYa :)

replies.body: Hey SeeYa soon! I also like to edit league videos especially montages. sry for my english by the way. Im not big on youtube, but I've learned that a montage can be very impressive by using an unknown song. A lot of known songs are NCS (No Copyright Sounds). There are many other Song you can use for that. I hope you know what i mean. Tonight I will upload my new Viktor montage on my channel Börnie TV, but i think it will be online in the day after. If you want to check it out feel free. I also would like to know what program you use for editing this video. it looks like a great start with a lot of potentional! Good work and keep going. Let me know if you want to ask me something. Greetings from Blind Tactician aka. Börnie TV
